summary.body: Office move forces commute from Barbican to Canary Wharf.  Does anyone already drive and wish to offer lift or set up car pool?
summary.subject: Commute to Canary Wharf

summary.body: Hi All, I'm hoping to move into the Barbican soon, and am investigating the option of joining a car club instead of having the associated expenses of keeping a car in Central London. Has anyone in the Barbican (maybe even the Barbican Association or The Corporation itself) thought about the possibility of setting up a Barbican Car Club? I've found one or two that operate in Central London, but perhaps some of you lot out are already members of car clubs that you can recommend to me? Regards Lightsleeper (Ann)
summary.subject: Car Clubs

summary.body: Does anyone have experience of the scheme described in a recent edition of Barbican Resident? I understand a car is parked in the John Trundle/Breton car park is is widely used.
summary.subject: Street Car car sharing scheme
